rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment reports symptoms and confirmation status factually ('developed respiratory symptoms', 'virus was not confirmed') without high-potency framing.
This reports a negative fact and a bare negation ('virus was not confirmed'), falling under Q7.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment contains a bare negation 'virus was not confirmed in any of them' without an explicit calming cue.
